vskel3d.c File Reference

vskel3d - 3D skeletonization. More...

Detailed Description

vskel3d - 3D skeletonization.

Description
3D skeletonization. The input image must be binary.
Reference
A.Manzanera,T.Bernard,F.Preteux,B.Longuet: "nD skeletonization: a unified mathematical framework", Journal of Electronic Engineering, Vol. 11-1, Jan. 2002, pp.25-37.
Usage
vskel3d
Parameters:
-in  input image
-out  output image
Examples

Known bugs
none.

G.Lohmann, MPI-CBS, 2004
